Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Stilt = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso
local leftStiltWeld local rightStiltWeld
local leftStilt local rightStilt
local bambooMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") bambooMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=60353110" --60288010" bambooMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=60257648" bambooMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.75, 0.75, 0.75)
Tool.Enabled = true
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end leftStiltWeld = myTorso:FindFirstChild("LeftStiltWeld") rightStiltWeld = myTorso:FindFirstChild("RightStiltWeld") leftStilt = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("LeftStilt") rightStilt = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("RightStilt") if not leftStilt and not rightStilt then rightStilt = Instance.new("Part") rightStilt.CanCollide = true rightStilt.Name = "LeftStilt" rightStilt.FormFactor = 3 rightStilt.Shape = "Block" rightStilt.Size = Vector3.new(0.8, 6, 0.8) rightStilt.Parent = vCharacter
local rightStiltMesh = bambooMesh:Clone() rightStiltMesh.Parent = rightStilt
rightStiltWeld = Instance.new("Weld") rightStiltWeld.Name = "RightStiltWeld" rightStiltWeld.Part0 = myTorso rightStiltWeld.Part1 = rightStilt rightStiltWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-1, 2, 0)) rightStiltWeld.Parent = myTorso
leftStilt = Instance.new("Part") leftStilt.CanCollide = true leftStilt.Name = "RightStilt" leftStilt.FormFactor = 3 leftStilt.Shape = "Block" leftStilt.Size = Vector3.new(0.8, 6, 0.8) leftStilt.Parent = vCharacter
local leftStiltMesh = bambooMesh:Clone() leftStiltMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=60353110" leftStiltMesh.Parent = leftStilt
leftStiltWeld = Instance.new("Weld") leftStiltWeld.Name = "LeftStiltWeld" leftStiltWeld.Part0 = myTorso leftStiltWeld.Part1 = leftStilt leftStiltWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(1, 2, 0)) leftStiltWeld.Parent = myTorso
myHumanoid.Jump = true
print("Stilt Created") end
Stilt.Transparency = 1.0
wait(2.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() Stilt.Transparency = 0.0 if leftStilt then leftStilt:Remove() leftStilt = nil end if rightStilt then rightStilt:Remove() rightStilt = nil end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Stilt = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso
local leftStiltWeld local rightStiltWeld
local leftStilt local rightStilt
local bambooMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") bambooMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=60354828" --60354121" --60353110" --60288010" bambooMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=60257648" bambooMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.75, 0.75, 0.75)
Tool.Enabled = true
local stiltWalkAnim local stiltActive
local animationScript
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
stiltActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("StiltActive") if stiltActive and stiltActive.Value == 0 then stiltActive.Value = 1 Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end leftStiltWeld = myTorso:FindFirstChild("LeftStiltWeld") rightStiltWeld = myTorso:FindFirstChild("RightStiltWeld") leftStilt = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("LeftStilt") rightStilt = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("RightStilt") if not leftStilt and not rightStilt then rightStilt = Instance.new("Part") rightStilt.CanCollide = true rightStilt.Name = "LeftStilt" rightStilt.FormFactor = 3 rightStilt.Shape = "Block" rightStilt.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 6, 0.4) rightStilt.Parent = vCharacter
local rightStiltMesh = bambooMesh:Clone() rightStiltMesh.Parent = rightStilt
rightStiltWeld = Instance.new("Weld") rightStiltWeld.Name = "RightStiltWeld" rightStiltWeld.Part0 = myTorso rightStiltWeld.Part1 = rightStilt rightStiltWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-1, 2, 0)) rightStiltWeld.Parent = myTorso
leftStilt = Instance.new("Part") leftStilt.CanCollide = true leftStilt.Name = "RightStilt" leftStilt.FormFactor = 3 leftStilt.Shape = "Block" leftStilt.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 6, 0.4) leftStilt.Parent = vCharacter
local leftStiltMesh = bambooMesh:Clone() leftStiltMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=60355643" --60353110" --60288863" leftStiltMesh.Parent = leftStilt
leftStiltWeld = Instance.new("Weld") leftStiltWeld.Name = "LeftStiltWeld" leftStiltWeld.Part0 = myTorso leftStiltWeld.Part1 = leftStilt leftStiltWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(1, 2, 0)) leftStiltWeld.Parent = myTorso
myHumanoid.Jump = true
print("Stilt Created") end
stiltWalkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.StiltWalkAnim) if stiltWalkAnim then stiltWalkAnim:Play() end
Stilt.Transparency = 1.0
animateScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("StiltAnimateScript") if animateScript then animateScript = animateScript:Clone() animateScript.Parent = vCharacter animateScript.Disabled = false end
wait(2.0) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() Stilt.Transparency = 0.0 if leftStilt then leftStilt:Remove() leftStilt = nil end if rightStilt then rightStilt:Remove() rightStilt = nil end stiltActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("StiltActive") if stiltActive then stiltActive.Value = 0 end if stiltWalkAnim then stiltWalkAnim:Stop() end
local checkScript = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("StiltAnimateScript") if checkScript then checkScript:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local vChar = script.Parent local myTorso = vChar:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if myTorso == nil then script:Remove() end
local leftStilt = vChar:FindFirstChild("LeftStilt") local rightStilt = vChar:FindFirstChild("RightStilt") local leftStiltWeld = myTorso:FindFirstChild("LeftStiltWeld") local rightStiltWeld = myTorso:FindFirstChild("RightStiltWeld")
while leftStiltWeld == nil or rightStiltWeld == nil do leftStiltWeld = myTorso:FindFirstChild("LeftStiltWeld") rightStiltWeld = myTorso:FindFirstChild("RightStiltWeld") wait() end
local lswOrigin = leftStiltWeld.C1 local rswOrigin = rightStiltWeld.C1
function animateStilts() local sign = 1 local count = 0 local rest = 1 while leftStilt and rightStilt and leftStiltWeld and rightStiltWeld and myTorso do count = count + 1 if count%2 == 1 then rest = 0 else sign = sign * 1 rest = 1 end leftStiltWeld.C1 = lswOrigin * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/18 * sign * rest, 0, 0) rightStiltWeld.C1 = rswOrigin * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/18 * sign * rest, 0, 0) wait(0.25) end print("Exiting") script:Remove() end
animateStilts()
